derivation: from G1537 (ἐκδύω) and the base of G1416 (ἐκδύω);
strongs_def: to cause to sink out of, i.e. (specially as of clothing) to divest
outline:
1. to take off
    1. to strip one of his garments
  2. to take off from one's self, to put off the one's raiments
  3. fig., to put off the body, the clothing of the soul
